name: HidashHi
tag_list: video, chat, open, browser, api, app
description: Browser based video voice chat platform
overview:
HidashHi offers a web-based video, voice and chat technology.

HidashHi allows you to connect to anyone who has an email address and is on-line, without going through the hassle of downloading any software or having to purchase any hardware. You sign up once with your email address and everything is browser-based.

A set of APIs is offered to quickly and deeply integrate into any front- or back end applications. HidashHi loves cutting edge technology like WebRTC, an open specification for realtime video communications, reducing the dependency of Adobe Flashplayer for video and media access.

One-to-One Voice/Video and messaging is free for users and integrators/developers. Premium user features like recording and group calls are available for a subscription fee.

Premium API features -like non-transparent integration- are available based on the amount of usage. Consumers & Corporates can use applications, such as corporate websites, call centers, interactive games and social media, built on top of the platform by integrators or developers.

Integrators/Developers can distribute their apps or services in whatever way they like, including free services under a fair usage policy.
